title: Backdoor Account Discovered in More Than 100,000 Zyxel Firewalls, VPN Gateways - Slashdot
description: More than 100,000 Zyxel firewalls, VPN gateways, and access point controllers contain a hardcoded admin-level backdoor account that can grant attackers root access to devices via either the SSH interface or the web administration panel. From a report: The backdoor account, discovered by a team of Du...
